page.title: 06MUTHILL SURVEY,RECREATION
page.content: { {Recreation}(main groups) {22}people named various kinds of sport as their favourite spare time occupation ranging from bowls to football and including sailing, swimming,cycling.{19}were keen gardeners,{12}prefered reading and{11} knitting.{6}enjoyed do-it-your-self and crafts. Only {one}person named television, but when we asked how many hours T.V.were watched in a week, the average was{19.5}the viewing ranging from {2}hours to{45}hours. {23}were in sports clubs,{12}in women's groups,{13}Guides or Scouts,{4}in Youth Club,{4}in farming societies,{9} in Over-60 and Whist Clubs,{4}in environmental societies e.g. Civic Trust.{Church}-{57 }said they belonged to church or Sunday School - a surprisingly high number.
